## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G43750](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G43750)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RFA1</u>
- **Gene Name:** RING finger ABA-related 1
- **Description:**   RING/U-box protein with C6HC-type zinc finger domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2101074
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
